Room.Name: Leonardo's Foundry
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the plaza of Leondardo's Foundry.
Room.LongDescription: The plaza provides access to the three shops Leonardo's Foundry services. The Custom Swords shop is located to the north, where fantastic swords of unequalled quality (and price) may be purchased. To the west is Unblemished Armor, where fine chain and and brigandine armor may be purchased. To the south is Cast Iron Shields, where strong shields of the finest iron are built to stand the toughest battles. The exit to Main Street is to the east.
